detaileddescription.para: This flag is 1 if real-space DMFT support enabled, 0 otherwhise

para.verbatim: embed:rst Inverse temperature. Interfaces to :f:var:`beta`.
embed:rst Flag to activate charge susceptibility evaluation. Interfaces to :f:var:`chidens_flag`.
embed:rst Flag to activate exciton susceptibility evaluation. Interfaces to :f:var:`chiexct_flag`.
embed:rst Flag to activate pair susceptibility evaluation. Interfaces to :f:var:`chipair_flag`.
embed:rst Flag to activate spin susceptibility evaluation. Interfaces to :f:var:`chispin_flag`.
embed:rst Convergence threshold. Interfaces to :f:var:`dmft_error`.
embed:rst Twin sector simmetry flag. Interfaces to :f:var:`ed_twin`.
embed:rst Flag setting orbital-resolved sectorization of Fock space Hamiltonian. Interfaces to :f:var:`ed_total_ud`.
embed:rst Real axis broadening. Interfaces to :f:var:`eps`.
embed:rst Hund's coupling. Interfaces to :f:var:`Jh`.
embed:rst Pair-hopping interaction strength. Interfaces to :f:var:`Jp`.
embed:rst Spin-exchange interaction strength. Interfaces to :f:var:`Jx`.
embed:rst Number of frequencies used in :math:`\chi^{2}` fit. Interfaces to :f:var:`Lfit`.
embed:rst Number of Matsubara frequencies. Interfaces to :f:var:`Lmats`.
embed:rst Number of real frequencies. Interfaces to :f:var:`Lreal`.
embed:rst Number of points in Probability Distribution Function lattice for phonons. Interfaces to :f:var:`Lpos`.
embed:rst Number of imaginary-time points. Interfaces to :f:var:`Ltau`.
embed:rst Number of bath sites. Interfaces to :f:var:`Nbath`.
embed:rst Number of DMFT loops. Interfaces to :f:var:`Nloop`.
embed:rst Number of orbitals. Interfaces to :f:var:`Norb`.
embed:rst Number of phonons. Interfaces to :f:var:`Nph`.
embed:rst Occupation value for fixed-density calculations. Interfaces to :f:var:`nread`.
embed:rst Number of spins. Interfaces to :f:var:`Nspin`.
embed:rst Number of iterations under convergence threshod. Interfaces to :f:var:`Nsuccess`.
embed:rst Symmetry-breaking field. Interfaces to :f:var:`sb_field`.
embed:rst Hubbard interaction strength. Interfaces to :f:var:`Uloc`.
embed:rst Density-density Kanamori interaction strength. Interfaces to :f:var:`Ust`.
embed:rst Upper bound on real axis frequencies. Interfaces to :f:var:`wfin`.
embed:rst Upper bound on real axis frequencies. Interfaces to :f:var:`wini`.
embed:rst Maximum of the x-range for the local lattice probability distribution function. Interfaces to :f:var:`xmax`.
embed:rst Minimum of the x-range for the local lattice probability distribution function. Interfaces to :f:var:`xmin`.
embed:rst Chemical potential. Interfaces to :f:var:`xmu`.
embed:rst This function reads the input. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_read_input`
embed:rst This function sets the local Hamiltonian. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_aux_funx/ed_set_Hloc`. Rank-2 array variant for single-site DMFT

parameterdescription.para: array of dimensions of the local Hamiltonian

para.verbatim: embed:rst This function gets the dimension of the user-accessible bath array. Interfaces to :f:func:`get_bath_dimension`.

simplesect.para: the dimension of the bath array

para.verbatim: embed:rst This function gets the dimension of the user-accessible bath array. Specific for replica and general baths. Interfaces to :f:func:`get_bath_dimension`.

parameterdescription.para: the number of components of the replica matrix linear combination

simplesect.para: the dimension of the bath array

para.verbatim: embed:rst This function updates a variable (usually the chemical potential) trying to achieve a desired density set by :f:var:`nread`. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_search-variable`.

parameterdescription.para: the density value at a given iteration

para.verbatim: embed:rst This function fits the Weiss field or hybridization function. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_bath_fit/ed_chi2_fitgf`. Single-site DMFT variant for :f:var:`ED_MODE` = :code:`NORMAL/NONSU2` and rank-3 arrays.

parameterdescription.para: dimensions of the function to fit
orbital index. If 0, the fortran function is called without iorb
integer flag to enable mpi. 1 for True, 0 for False

flag to set (1) or not (0) calculation with real-space DMFT

para.verbatim: embed:rst This function initializes the solver. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/ed_init_solver`. Single-site DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function initializes the solver for an isolated impurity. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/ed_init_solver`. Single-site DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function initializes the solver. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/ed_init_solver`. Real-space DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function initializes the solver for an isolated impurity. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/ed_init_solver`. Real-space DMFT variant.
embed:rst Solves the impurity problem. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/solve`. Single-site DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function solves the impurity problem for the case of an isolated impurity. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/solve`. Single-site DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function solves the impurity problem. Interfaces to :f:func:`e2i_main/solve`. Real-space DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function solves the impurity problem for the case of an isolated impuirty. Interfaces to :f:func:`e2i_main/solve`. Real-space DMFT variant.
embed:rst This function finalizes the solver. Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_main/finalize_solver` and :f:func:`e2i_main/finalize_solver`.

parameterdescription.para: number of inequivalent sites. Set to 0 for single-site DMFT.

para.verbatim: embed:rst This function resets the interaction coefficients and user-provided terms Interfaces to :f:func:`ed_parse_umatrix/reset_umatrix`.
